overview:
Sudhir leads Haileo’s core scientific team in developing the revolutionary technology and algorithms that define our vision. He is an accomplished and experienced researcher in a diverse set of fields, including: algorithms, computational complexity, convex optimization, information theory, machine learning, computer vision, game theory, information & Internet economics, and quantum computing. Sudhir has published fundamental contributions in these fields in reputed journals and conferences, and his work have been featured in popular news portals such as New Scientist and IEEE Spectrum. Prior to joining Haileo, he held research positions at UCLA and NetSeer, Inc. Sudhir is a believer in his ability to delve and innovate in the fundamental topics at the heart of information processing. His current passion is in enabling, understanding, and harnessing the information explosion in the Web era.

Sudhir received BS and MS degrees in Mathematics and Computing from IIT Kharagpur in India, and MS and Ph.D. degrees in Electrical Engineering from UCLA.
